title.narrative: Bangladesh - Secondary Education Quality and Access Improvement

description.narrative: The objectives of the Secondary Education Quality and Access Enhancement Project (SEQAEP) for Bangladesh are to improve the quality of secondary education, systematically monitor learning outcomes, and to increase access and equity in project upazilas. This restructuring paper introduces changes in the project in terms of re-allocation of International Development Association (IDA) credit across cost-categories and an amendment to the project's financing agreement. The change is an increased allocation for the stipends category to meet current disbursement needs of the project.

participating-org.narrative: Directorate of Secondary and Higher Education, MOE

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :FA, Sched. 2, Section I, para. A.5 | Description :Project Educational Institutions to establish and maintain aSMC or MMC, and a PTA | Due Date :31-Dec-2008
Finance Agreement :FA, Sched. 2, Section I, para. A.6 | Description :Enter into a Cooperation Agreement with each ProjectEducational Institution | Due Date :31-Dec-2008
Finance Agreement :FA, Sched. 2, Section II, A.1 | Description :Prepare project monitoring reports and submit to IDA each calendarsemester | Frequency :SemiAnnual
Finance Agreement :FA, Sched. 2, Section II, A.1 | Description :Submit a semi-annual M&E report to IDA | Frequency :SemiAnnual
Finance Agreement :FA, Sched. 2, Section II, para. A.2(i) | Description :Submit a comprehensive mid-term report | Due Date:20-Jun-2011

Finance Agreement :FA, Sched. 2, Section IV, B.1 | Description :Submit project progress and expenditures on Categories (1) & (2)and work program for subsequent Academic Year for IDA's approval | Frequency :Yearly
